scenes.description: Performance of the song 'HoloHawk' by a special unit.
Interstitial transition for hololive Countdown Live 2024-2025.
Performance of the song 'What an amazing swing' by Tsunomaki Watame, Shishiro Botan, and Ouro Kronii.
